title: Campaign Manager Japan
overview: A highly motivated individual is sought for the Campaign Manager Japan position based in Tokyo, Japan, responsible for the setup and execution of advertising campaigns across all channels, ensuring accurate performance and identifying optimization opportunities.

extras.title: What You'll Do
content: Partner with Account Management, Sales and all internal cross-functional teams to launch, run and fully deliver deals across all buying channels (Direct IO, PG, PMP and Podcasts)
Set up, lead and optimize direct and programmatic ad campaigns across multiple clients, platforms and technology partners
QA all creative prior to launching live campaigns, to ensure they are to spec, adhere to our policies and will work on the platform.
Support Deal ID, Programmatic Guaranteed management, deal health assessment and recommendations

Lead the daily management of all campaigns across direct and programmatic channels including but not limited to ongoing, comprehensive in-flight reporting, proactively identifying problem areas that might require a campaign revision
Proactively determine solutions to ensure revenue flow and incremental spend
Participate in campaign kick-offs to understand campaign objectives and critical metrics, ensuring effective and timely campaign execution
Daily monitoring of campaign pacing and performance
Serve as a partner for frontline sales support, across Direct and Programmatic
Provide technical expertise to troubleshoot all technical issues across measurement, targeting, DSPs or other identified areas, and raise to the appropriate internal cross-functional teams
Assist with billing needs and questions; lead invoice revision process when needed
Adhere to internal standard methodology guidelines, processes and an operating cadence as established by Spotifyâ€™s sales strategy
Fluent in 3rd party tracking vendors, including brand studies, viewability and other relevant industry technology players

extras.title: Who You Are
content: You have a minimum of 2-3 years' proven experience in Ad Operations, Account Management or Campaign Management while also having solid digital media industry knowledge and a desire to learn more about the digital media industry

Previous knowledge in Ad Operations and the programmatic landscape especially with Google Ad Manager and/or another ad-serving platform, such as AdX, Rubicon, The Trade Desk is preferred but not required.
You understand the technical foundations of digital media, podcasts and programmatic media and have the ability to proactively determine solutions to problems
You are passionate about digital strategy and growing within the business operations or sales organizations
You have strong verbal, written, and presentation skills in both Japanese and English
You are a highly organized and focused multi-tasker with strong attention to detail, analytical and project management skills and can work independently within a team focused organization
You thrive in a fast-paced, deadline and detailed oriented environment
You believe in the power of teamwork and are a great teammate

You have excellent dexterity with Google and Microsoft suite of products including excel and powerpoint and have experience working within CRMs, Order Management Systems, Ad Servers and other digital media tech systems

extras.title: Where You'll Be
content: This role is based in Tokyo, Japan
